name: to my bb Gab
greetingText: Thank you for everything! You mean so much to me (since you're a meanie huhu hmph)!
wishText: May the js.prototypes always be with you! ;)
text1: It's your birthday!!! hehehe you're an oldie and I'll be the same age as you next year jk
textInChatBox: BB HAPPY BIRTHDAY I LOVE YOU! Blah Blah poo Zzz...
text2: That's what I was going to send via message, which I did.
text4: I also wanted to do something
text5Content: You are my special someone aww kilig love u
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it. I love you! 大好き！ Have the bestest day at Universal Studios
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
